p: Three novel mutant viruses, 5NCME XZ0934, 5NCM XZ0934, and E XZ0934, which contain the 5′-NCR-C-prM-E region, 5′-NCR-C-prM region, and only the E region of the recent GV isolate XZ0934, respectively, were produced and then inoculated into mice ( Fig. 1; Table 1; Supplementary Fig. S1, Experiment 2). All the eight mice inoculated with 5NCME XZ0934 or 5NCME Muar died, and the mean time to death of 5NCME XZ0934-inoculated mice was very similar to that of the 5NCME Muar-inoculated mice. Six and seven out of eight mice inoculated with 5NCM XZ0934 and E XZ0934, respectively, died, and the mean times of death in the two mice groups were similar. These results imply that the 5′-NCR-C-prM-E region in XZ0934 also has the ability to increase the virulence of Mie/41/2002.
